page.title: 12A MEAL AT BEAFORD SCHOOL
page.content:
At 8 a.m. the school cook begins to prepare the school meals. Everyday we have a different kind of food. Here is one menu which we have:- Choice of sausage or ham Chips Choice of salad or baked beans Tomato sauce
Then Doughnuts, or Jelly with meringue on top. After the dinner children have finished, those bringing packed lunches have their food. I am in this group and usually bring sandwiches or crackers, chocolate biscuit or cake, crisps and some fruit. Dinner time is between 12 and 1 o'clock. The cook and her helper do not finish washing up till about 2.30, when their day ends.
